price: Say, “None can ever protect me from Allah [if I should disobey Him], nor can I ever find refuge except in Him.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
